67017.name: 16.3.2 - Unsentenced detainees as a proportion of overall prison population
67017.datasetName: Unsentenced detainees as a proportion of overall prison population
67017.s_name: Unsentenced detainees as a proportion of overall prison population

source.name: Unsentenced detainees as a proportion of overall prison population
source.additionalInfo:
Definition: 
 
The total number of persons held in detention who have not yet been sentenced, as a percentage of the 
total number of persons held in detention, on a specified date. 
 
Comments and limitations: 
 
The target relates to the multidimensional concepts of rule of law and access to justice and at least two 
indicators are required to cover the main elements of access to justice and efficiency of the justice 
system. The proposed indicator 16.3.2 covers the efficiency of the justice system. 
 

 
Data Availability

The target relates to the multidimensional concepts of rule of law and access to justice and at least two 
indicators are required to cover the main elements of access to justice and efficiency of the justice

Time series:
